title: Linear Programming Based Near-Optimal Pricing for Laminar Bayesian Online Selection
abstract: arXiv:1807.05477v2 Announce Type: replace-cross  Abstract: The Bayesian online selection problem aims to design a pricing scheme for a sequence of arriving buyers that maximizes the expected social welfare (or revenue) subject to different structural constraints. Inspired by applications with a hierarchy of service, this paper focuses on the cases where a laminar matroid characterizes the set of served buyers. We give the first Polynomial-Time Approximation Scheme (PTAS) for the problem when the laminar matroid has constant depth. Our approach is based on rounding the solution of a hierarchy of linear programming relaxations that approximate the optimum online solution with any degree of accuracy, plus a concentration argument showing that rounding incurs a small loss. We also study another variation, which we call the production-constrained problem. The allowable set of served buyers is characterized by a collection of production and shipping constraints that form a particular example

translated_title: 基于线性规划的近似最优价格定价算法用于层次贝叶斯在线选择问题
translated_abstract: 贝叶斯在线选择问题旨在为一系列到达的买家设计定价方案，以最大化预期社会福利（或收入），同时满足不同的结构约束。受到服务层次结构的应用启发，本文重点研究了当层次化拟阵表征被服务买家集合时的情况。我们提出了当层次化拟阵深度为常数时该问题的首个多项式时间逼近方案（PTAS）。我们的方法基于将一系列线性规划松弛的解四舍五入，以任意精度逼近最优在线解，再通过浓度论证表明四舍五入会带来较小损失。我们还研究了另一种变体，称为“受生产限制问题”。被服务买家的允许集合特征由一组生产和运输约束形成，构成一种特殊示例。
tldr: 该论文提出了一个基于层次结构拟阵的贝叶斯在线选择问题的近似最优价格定价算法，通过对线性规划松弛解的四舍五入以及浓度论证，实现对任意精度的在线解逼近，并研究了受生产限制问题。
en_tdlr: This paper presents an approximate near-optimal pricing algorithm for laminar Bayesian online selection problem, which rounds the solution of linear programming relaxations and utilizes a concentration argument to approximate the optimum online solution with any degree of accuracy, also studying the production-constrained problem.
